response.overview: After conducting the interviews, Worm transferred the interviewees to the mobile platform. After some Worms go to see a solo exhibition of the human with a spherical head, they realize that they want to give their children a better future, to do so they have to travel to the coast. After reaching the coast, they release their baby through a drifting bottle. The bottle was intercepted and the two worms turned into two earthworms. Two earthworms created an human artist and the artist photographed both humans and waterfowl and subsequently held a solo exhibition at the Worm Museum.
response.title: Worm Regards and Other Stories
